description.en: Omiga is an innovative inscription protocol built on the CKB (Common Knowledge Base) blockchain, designed to provide a fairer and more efficient experience for minting and managing inscriptions. Developed by the Nervos ecosystem team, Omiga leverages CKB's unique Cell model and Proof-of-Work consensus to create a native inscription mechanism that eliminates the need for centralized indexers, unlike traditional Bitcoin inscriptions. It supports mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat and OKX Web3, enabling seamless cross-chain interactions and providing a more secure, decentralized approach to digital asset creation and management.
description.ch: Omiga 是建立在 CKB (Common Knowledge Base) 区块链上的创新铭文协议，旨在为铸造和管理铭文提供更公平、更高效的体验。由 Nervos 生态系统团队开发，Omiga 利用 CKB 独特的 Cell 模型和工作量证明共识创建原生铭文机制，与传统的比特币铭文不同，它消除了对中心化索引器的需求。它支持 Unisat 和 OKX Web3 等主流比特币钱包，实现无缝跨链交互，为数字资产创建和管理提供更安全、去中心化的方法。

description.en: Pioneering inscription protocol built on Nervos CKB
description.ch: 建立在 Nervos CKB 上的开创性铭文协议

description.en: Equitable distribution with a fair minting process
description.ch: 通过公平铸造过程实现公平分配

description.en: Supports mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat and OKX Web3
description.ch: 支持 Unisat 和 OKX Web3 等主流比特币钱包

description.en: Removing the need for centralized indexing, unlike inscription on Bitcoin
description.ch: 与比特币铭文不同，消除对中心化索引的需求

q.en: What makes Omiga's inscription mechanism unique?
q.ch: 什么使 Omiga 的铭文机制独特？

a.en: Omiga uses a native inscription mechanism with PoW and extended UTXO (Cell model), enabling on-chain pricing, fusion, and melting capabilities. It eliminates the need for centralized indexers, ensuring true decentralization and security.
a.ch: Omiga 使用具有 PoW 和扩展 UTXO (Cell 模型) 的原生铭文机制，实现链上定价、融合和销毁功能。它消除了对中心化索引器的需求，确保真正的去中心化和安全性。

a.en: Currently, Omiga operates without cross-chain bridges for its core inscription minting on CKB. However, future plans include opening cross-chain bridges and trading markets to facilitate trading of Bitcoin and CKB inscription assets, enhancing ecosystem interoperability.
a.ch: 目前，Omiga 在 CKB 上的核心铭文铸造无需跨链桥接。然而，未来计划包括开放跨链桥接和交易市场，以促进比特币和 CKB 铭文资产的交易，增强生态系统互操作性。

q.en: What is the purpose of Omiga's inscriptions?
q.ch: Omiga 铭文的目的是什么？

a.en: Beyond meme tokens, Omiga's inscriptions support Turing-complete contracts and xUDT (Extensible User Defined Token) compatibility, enabling utility in DeFi, DEX, and token-gated communities. They are designed for real-world applications and ecosystem integration.
a.ch: 除了迷因代币，Omiga 的铭文支持图灵完备合约和 xUDT (可扩展用户定义代币) 兼容性，实现 DeFi、DEX 和代币门控社区的实用性。它们专为现实世界应用和生态系统集成而设计。
